title: DietOpti - Optimize your diet
description:
DietOpti analyzes your meals for optimal nutrition. Track calories and get personalized AI advice.
Features:
•	Easy Analysis: Snap meal photos or manually enter food.
•	PFC Tracking: Monitor calories and macronutrient balance with graphs.
•	Personalized Advice: Get tailored meal plans, recipes, and guidance.
•	Notifications: Receive motivational messages.
•	Social Sharing: Share your food diary and goals.
Ideal for those who want to:
•	Lose weight.
•	Eat healthier.
•	Get personalized advice.
